mapper.select: SELECT U.U_ID as userId, U.U_NAME as name, U.U_PHONE as phone, A.REG_RESULT as status, A.REJECT_RS as rejectReason FROM VOLUNTEER_USER U JOIN VOLUNTEER_REG R ON R.U_ID = U.U_ID JOIN ACCEPTION_RES A ON R.VREG_NO = A.VREG_NO JOIN VOLUNTEER V ON V.V_NO = R.V_NO JOIN CENTER_MNG_TABLE C ON C.C_ID = V.C_ID WHERE C.C_ID = #{centerId} AND R.V_TYPE = 0 ORDER BY V.CREATED_DATE DESC

SELECT U.U_ID AS userId, U.U_NAME AS name, U.U_PHONE AS phone, A.REG_RESULT AS status, A.REJECT_RS AS rejectReason FROM VOLUNTEER_USER U JOIN VOLUNTEER_REG R ON R.U_ID = U.U_ID JOIN ACCEPTION_RES A ON R.VREG_NO = A.VREG_NO WHERE R.V_TYPE = 1 AND R.C_ID = #{centerId}

SELECT U.U_ID AS userId, U.U_NAME AS name, U.U_PHONE AS phone FROM VOLUNTEER_USER U JOIN ADOPT_REG A ON A.U_ID = U.U_ID JOIN CENTER_MNG_TABLE C ON A.C_NAME = C.C_NAME WHERE C.C_NAME = (SELECT C_NAME FROM CENTER_MNG_TABLE WHERE C_ID = #{centerId})
SELECT V_TITLE FROM VOLUNTEER WHERE C_ID = #{centerId} ORDER BY CREATED_DATE DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM VOLUNTEER_USER U JOIN VOLUNTEER_REG R ON R.U_ID = U.U_ID JOIN ACCEPTION_RES A ON R.VREG_NO = A.VREG_NO JOIN VOLUNTEER V ON V.V_NO = R.V_NO JOIN CENTER_MNG_TABLE C ON C.C_ID = V.C_ID WHERE C.C_ID = #{centerId} AND R.V_TYPE = 0
